subject: Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Tight end Dallas Clark, one of Peyton Manning’s favorite receivers, signed a six-year contract with the Indianapolis Colts, a day after the team placed the franchise tag on him. Terms were not disclosed, but as the franchise player, he would have been guaranteed $4.55 million, the average of the top five tight-end salaries in the N.F.L.
